key.name: base-path
key.summary: The directory in which the tree of notes is stored.

key.name: csd
key.summary: Display a GNOME style CSD title bar instead of deferring to the window manager / gtk fallback.

key.name: syntax-highlighting
key.summary: Enable syntax highlighting in three-backtick code spans, using the languages supported by your system's GtkSourceView (gedit, pluma etc.) setup.
